trans-unit.target: 你以展示手牌的方式进行游戏。

trans-unit.resname: ICE·23 | Enduring Renewal | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将抓一张牌，则改为展示你的牌库顶牌。 若该牌是生物牌，则将它置入你的坟墓场。 若否，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ICE·23 | Enduring Renewal | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物从场上置入你的坟墓场时，将它移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Each player loses a third of their life, then discards a third of the cards in their hand, then sacrifices a third of the creatures they control, then sacrifices a third of the lands they control. Round up each time.
trans-unit.target: 每个玩家损失1/3生命；然后每人选择并弃掉1/3手牌；然后每人牺牲1/3所操控的生物；最后每人牺牲所操控的1/3地。所有损失皆以无条件进位计算。

trans-unit.source: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 1 life and target opponent loses 1 life, and you decide whether to flip again. If you lose the flip, you lose 1 life and that opponent gains 1 life, and that player decides whether to flip again. Double the life stakes with each flip.

trans-unit.resname: ICE·297 | Merieke Ri Berit | Card Name
ICE·297 | Merieke Ri Berit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME doesn't untap during your untap step.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME于你的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: ICE·297 | Merieke Ri Berit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control CARDNAME. When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: {T}：只要你操控CARDNAME，便获得目标生物的操控权。 当CARDNAME离场或成为未横置时，消灭该生物。 它不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: ICE·317 | Elkin Bottle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card.
trans-unit.target: o3，ocT：将你的牌库上的顶牌面朝上的放在一旁。你可将此牌视为在你手上般的使用。在你的下一回合开始时，若该牌未被使用，则埋葬它。

trans-unit.resname: ICE·323 | Infinite Hourglass | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，放置一个计时指示物于CARDNAME上。

trans-unit.resname: ICE·323 | Infinite Hourglass | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: All creatures get +1/+0 for each time counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得+X/+0，其中X等于在CARDNAME上计时指示物的数量。

trans-unit.resname: ICE·323 | Infinite Hourglass | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}: Remove a time counter from CARDNAME. Any player may activate this ability but only during any upkeep step.
trans-unit.target: 任何玩家皆可以在任何维持阶段中支付o3以移去CARDNAME上的一个计时指示物。

trans-unit.resname: ICE·324 | Jester's Cap | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从目标牌手的牌库中搜寻三张牌，并将它们放逐。然后该牌手洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: ICE·342 | Time Bomb | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: CARDNAME deals damage equal to the number of time counters on it to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: o1，ocT，牺牲CARDNAME：CARDNAME对所有玩家及生物造成与在CARDNAME上之计时指示物数量等量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: ICE·343 | Urza's Bauble | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Look at a card at random in target player's hand. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
trans-unit.target: ocT，牺牲CARDNAME：随机由目标对手的手牌中选择一张，并且检视该牌。你在下回合开始时抽一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ICE·344 | Vexing Arcanix | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Target player chooses a card name, then reveals the top card of their library. If that card has the chosen name, that player puts it into their hand. Otherwise, they put it into their graveyard and CARDNAME deals 2 damage to them.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：目标牌手说出一个牌名，然后展示其牌库顶牌。若该牌的名称是你所说的名称，则该牌手将该牌置于其手上。若不是，则该牌手将该牌置入其坟墓场，并且CARDNAME对他造成2点伤害。
